sentences.sContent: Her dog yelped and came to heel.
sentences.sCn: 她的狗汪地叫了一声，紧跟了上来。

remMethod.val: 发出尖叫(yelp)， 寻求帮助(help)

trans.tranOther: If a person or dog yelps, they give a sudden short cry, often because of fear or pain
a short sharp high cry which a person or an animal makes because they are excited, in pain, surprised etc
